mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT w.user_id AS w_id, w.region_id, w.name, rc.name AS region_name, w.introduction, w.status, w.created_at AS worker_created_at, w.updated_at AS worker_updated_at, w.deleted_at AS worker_deleted_at, u.id AS u_id, u.name AS u_name, u.phone_mobile AS u_phone, u.email AS u_email, wf.id AS wf_id, wf.user_id AS wf_user_id, wf.file_id, wf.file_type, f.id AS f_id, f.file_path, f.original_name, f.file_name, f.mime_type, f.file_size, f.created_at AS file_created_at, wfd.field_id AS wf_field_id, wf2.name AS work_field_name FROM worker w LEFT JOIN users u ON w.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN region_category rc ON w.region_id = rc.id LEFT JOIN worker_file wf ON w.user_id = wf.user_id LEFT JOIN file f ON wf.file_id = f.id LEFT JOIN worker_field wfd ON w.user_id = wfd.user_id LEFT JOIN work_field wf2 ON wfd.field_id = wf2.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY wf.file_type ASC;
mapper.update:
UPDATE worker
introduction = #{introduction},
region_id = #{regionId},
name = #{name},
status = #{status},
deleted_at = #{deletedAt},
WHERE user_id = #{userId}
